name: streaming-video
description: An example streaming video server written in Nodejs.

scripts.install: mkdir videos && cd videos && curl -O https://cdn.spacetelescope.org/archives/videos/medium_podcast/hubblecast95a.mp4 && curl -O https://cdn.spacetelescope.org/archives/videos/hd_and_apple/hubblecast95a.m4v

author: Nathan H. Bean
